name.en: Signal Processing of Power Quality Disturbances

notice.ch: 資訊電機學院大學部四年級可選修

remark.ch: 資訊電機學院大學部四年級可選修

goal.ch: This course allows students to develop abilities for information analysis and measurement of power and energy problems with the advanced signal processing.
goal.en: This course allows students to develop abilities for information analysis and measurement of power and energy problems with the advanced signal processing.

outline.ch:
1. Introduction to Power System
2. Introduction to Power Quality Disturbances and Energy Problems
3. Signal Processing for Power Quality Disturbances - Harmonics
4. Signal Processing for Power Quality Disturbances - Flickers
5. Signal Processing for Power Quality Disturbances - Power Events
6. International Standards for Power Measurement
7. Design of Power Analyzer
outline.en:
1. Introduction to Power System
2. Introduction to Power Quality Disturbances and Energy Problems
3. Signal Processing for Power Quality Disturbances - Harmonics
4. Signal Processing for Power Quality Disturbances - Flickers
5. Signal Processing for Power Quality Disturbances - Power Events
6. International Standards for Power Measurement
7. Design of Power Analyzer

textbook.ch: "M. H. J. Bollen and I. Y. H. Gu, Signal Processing of Power Quality Disturbances, John Wiley & Sons, Inc., 2006."
textbook.en: "M. H. J. Bollen and I. Y. H. Gu, Signal Processing of Power Quality Disturbances, John Wiley & Sons, Inc., 2006."

gradMethod.ch:
1. Midterm and Final Presentation: 60%
2. Assignments: 20%
3. Class Participation: 20%
gradMethod.en:
1. Midterm and Final Presentation: 60%
2. Assignments: 20%
3. Class Participation: 20%
